#include<cmath>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<set>
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vs vector<string>
#define fori(s,e) for(i=s;i<=e;i++)
#define forj(s,e) for(j=s;j<=e;j++)
#define fork(s,e) for(k=s;k<=e;k++)
#define ull unsigned long long
#define ll long long
#define imax INT_MAX
#define imin INT_MIN
#define sz(x) (int)x.size()
#define ppb pop_back
#define max(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define min(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()
#define MAX 100010
#define mem(x,y) memset(x,y,sizeof(x));
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define psi pair<string,int>
#define in(c,x) scanf("%"#c,&x)
#define out(c,x) printf("%"#c" ",x)
#define aa first
#define bb second
#define mod 10007
using namespace std;
int arr[10000012]= {0};
ll expo(ll b,ll p)
{
    if (p==0) return 1;
    else
    {
        ll x=expo(b,p/2);
        if (p&1)
        {
            x=(x*x)%mod;
            return (x*b)%mod;
        }
        else
            return (x*x)%mod;
    }
}
ll expo2(ll b,ll p)
{
    ll x=1,r;
    while(p>0)
    {
        r=p%2;
        p=p/2;
        if (r==1) x=(x*b)%mod;
        b=(b*b)%mod;
    }
    return x;
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,n,m,y,cnt=0;

    fori(1,10000009) arr[i]=1;
    arr[0]=arr[1]=0;
    int s=sqrt(10000010);
    fori(2,s)
    {
        if (arr[i]==1)
        {
            //arr[i]=1;
            for (j=2*i; j<=10000010; j+=i)
            {
                arr[j]=0;
            }
        }
    }
    fori(2,10000010)
    arr[i]=arr[i]+arr[i-1];
    while(scanf("%d",&n)==1)
    {
        if (n==1)
        {
            cout<<0<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",expo2(2,arr[n]-1));
    }
    return 0;
}
